1.title: Starting Over
1.plot: Embarking on their fresh start heading into winter ahead of the much anticipated 2019 Storm Season, The team must first take care of a few things.

2.title: Elk City
2.plot: An unforgettable event - Two tornadoes in two different states while obtaining groundbreaking scientific data. Navigating the back roads of Oklahoma creates major headaches.

imdb.plot outline: Storm Trackers is an all-new raw online docudrama storm chasing series that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Ride along and experience the thrill and drama of Mother Nature's fury up close and personal. Through the tearful stories, interviews and the raw drama storm chasing brings with it, the Storm Trackers are on the search for mother nature's most EXTREME weather. Embark with us as the Storm Trackers reflect over the 2018 storm season and start making preparations for the 2019 season. However, they must get through winter first. After a rough, long and slow 2018 storm season, the anticipation and excitement have never been higher for the Storm Trackers, Joshua Napper, Paden Gordon, Lanny Dean, Tyler Schlitt, and the rest of the team.
imdb.title: Storm Trackers
